name: mikroe.click.hbridge16
short_description: H-Bridge 16 Click is a compact add-on board with an H-Bridge gate driver, also known as a full-bridge pre-driver. This board features the DRV8262, a dual H-Bridge motor driver from Texas Instruments. The motor driver is designed for a variety of industrial applications and can drive one or two brushed DC motors, one stepper motor, and one or two thermoelectric coolers (TEC). It can operate in a wide supply voltage range of 4.5V to 65V.
